price: 52 Garde-toi donc de céder aux mécréants, mais appelle-les sans relâche à la foi par le Coran.
arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدۡهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: falā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wajāhid'hum bihi jihādan kabīran
